landingDesc: StudyShare is a platform where students can review courses anonymously at LTH â€“ so you can make informed decisions
aboutUsDesc: We are two Computer Science students at Lund University (LTH) who wanted to make it easier for students to navigate course choices.
aboutSiteDesc: StudyShare is a student-driven platform for finding and sharing reviews of university courses at LTH. Our goal is to improve transparency and help you make more informed academic choices.
contactDesc: Have questions or suggestions? Fill in the form and we'll get back to you!
browseDesc: Browse new courses and make your master special.
writeDesc: Write reviews on courses you've read to help other students with their course choices.
saveDesc: Save courses as favorites to find them easily again.
notFoundText: Sorry, we couldn't find the page you were looking for.
readyToStart: Ready to find your next great course?
